title: Quiz on the Executive Branch of the U.S. Government

questions.question: Who is the head of the executive branch?
What is the role of the Vice President?
options: Head of the House of Representatives

questions.question: Which department is responsible for the nation's foreign policy?
Who is responsible for developing and executing the federal budget?
options: Director of the Office of Management and Budget
questions.answer: Director of the Office of Management and Budget

questions.question: Which position is the chief advisor to the President on national security issues?
Who represents the United States at the United Nations?
Which agency is responsible for enforcing environmental laws and regulations?
What is the primary role of the Small Business Administration (SBA)?
